verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: advocates] [ARG1: stricter enforcement of immigration laws] , but some communities are becoming sanctuaries .
The Trump administration advocates stricter enforcement of immigration laws , but some communities [V: are] becoming sanctuaries .
The Trump administration advocates stricter enforcement of immigration laws , but [ARG1: some communities] are [V: becoming] [ARG2: sanctuaries] .
